<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Manual Input"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/style-transfer/manual"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create extraction from manually provided product data.

Use this when URL extraction fails due to bot protection.

How to use:
1. Open product page in browser
2. Copy product title and description
3. Right-click images -&gt; "Copy Image Address" for URLs
4. Submit to this endpoint

The data is processed exactly like auto-extraction.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

</Heading>
